question: Which Indian company has been announced as the title sponsor of Women’s T20 Challenge 2020?
explanation:
The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has recently announced Jio as the title sponsor for the upcoming 2020 edition of the Women's T20 Challenge.
The partnership will also be supported by Reliance Foundation Education and Sports for All (RF ESA). This is the first time a sponsor has signed with BCCI exclusively for the women's matches. Women's T20 Challenge will be played from November 4-9 in Sharjah.
